import React from 'react'; export default function ShopCard(props){ return(
{props.closeShop()}}>
Total : {props.total}$
{props.objs2.map((e,i)=>

{e.name}

{e.price}$

{props.Undo(e)}} value='UNDO ' type='button' className='btn btn-danger text-light col-7 d-block mx-auto'/>
)} {props.total>0 && }
) }
